title: Chlorine Sky
description: A novel-in-verse about a young girl coming-of-age and stepping out of the shadow of her former best friend.She looks me hard in my eyes& my knees lock into tree trunksMy eyes don't dance like my heartbeat racingThey stare straight back hot daggers.I remember things will never be the same.I remember things.Mahogany L. Browne delivers a novel-in-verse about broken promises, fast rumors, and when growing up means growing apart from your best friend.
author: Mahogany L. Browne
